forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
